name: One Home 2048
description:
Swipe, Match, Upgrade landscapes and buildings

A versatile 2048 game about balancing human progress and conserving nature. Merge to Upgrade tranquil landscapes such as volcanoes, oceans and polar ice. Let the humans build their homes on grasslands and harvest forests for energy to cast terraforming spells like instant level up, removing lower levels and randomize all tiles. Land expands from 4x4 to 6x6. Fill up your little album with screenshots of your favorite scenery. A pleasant little bedtime game and a little shaking up for veteran 2048 lovers. An Indie Game developed for the love of isometric arts and insomnia.

Easy to learn - Based on popular 2048 puzzles genre swipe & match fun 
Versatile 2048 - Has two sets of tile types to spice things up (nature vs humans) and allows 3 land shapes!
Bedtime-friendly - Yes! I have insomnia and wanted a soothing game
Endless - The land expansion has a limit but you can keep going after all the unlocks, no game-overs, maybe count a sheep or two (not saying that there's a sheep but maybe there is one inside)
Isometric - Just something endearing about drawing things in this classic retro perspective
